amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a definition of work for the purposes of the bill; provide that the two year-and out provisions apply to two parent AFDC families; and require all adult single-parent welfare recipients with children over the age of 5 to engage in work activities for a minimum of 30 hours per week.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require all adult single-parent welfare recipients with children over the age of 5 to engage in work activities for a minimum of 30 hours per week.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Talent amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 337 (Roll no. 259).
